item.title: Serverless dev with Cloudflare Workers
item.description: I recently learned of a neat Cloudflare tool to that lets developers deploy “serverless code”: Cloudflare Workers. It approximates AWS Lambda in being a compute instance that lives in closer to the edge of the users' site, and it’s fast at doing what it does. “Just deploy code” in your choice of language: Javascript, Rust, Python, C/C++… and you needn’t preoccupy yourself about unused capacity, auto-scaling, or load balancing.
